description: The Maxxy Artistry Gallery initiative in Kenya focuses on transforming discarded bottles into unique art pieces, addressing both environmental issues and personal memories. Their founder, who transitioned from IT to pursue his passion for art, says the project not only beautifies homes but also provides employment opportunities. By collaborating with local teams for bottle collection and engaging in community training, the initiative fosters creativity while promoting sustainability and environmental awareness.
name: Maxxy Artistry Gallery
